overview: Fearless, straight and hard as a punch in the face. At last, one of Sweden's most acclaimed comedian back with brand new material. The show "Word of Life" is the most comprehensive tour some comic done in Sweden and has been sold out everything from Malmo to Kiruna. Magnus Betnér continues to question, discuss, and driving with today's society in a way that both affects and upsets. The show has been shown on Channel 5, and is now being released on DVD and provides 110 minutes not previously seen material + 46 minutes bonus material!
tagline: Fearless, straight and hard as a punch in the face.
title: Magnus Betnér - Word of Life
